manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Available in 2 Sizes Key Ingredients T-4 Tonic Blend: Witch Hazel Extract: Soothes tender skin Nettle Leaf Extract: Natural astringent Rosemary Extract: Moisturizing Horsetail Root Extract: Antioxidant Sorbitol: Excellent humectant Aloe Vera: Promotes moisture and soothes the skin Quinoa: Conditioning REUZEL Shave Cream Close & Comfortable Shave REUZEL Shave Cream is a highly concentrated, rich and super-slick formula, helps give you a nick-free, smooth-skin shave Gives you the closest, most comfortable shave Reduces cuts, nicks, scrapes and razor irritation Leaves your skin soft and smooth
SCUMBASSADOR TIP: Massage residual Reuzel Shave Cream into the skin post shave for added moisturizing benefits.
REUZEL Aftershave REUZEL Astringent Foam REUZEL Beard Foam

Bertus & Leen The founders of REUZEL started learning mens' haircutting when they were just fourteen years old. With their love of classic barbering and the influences of rock and roll, kustom kulture, and its subcultures, it was inevitable that one day Leen and Bertus would open Schorem Haarsnijder en Barbier - The House of REUZEL Leen and Bertus wanted to cut every man the perfect hairstyle, proper porkchop. And to provide a haven. A barbershop. A place men could trust the products and enjoy the company. Those classic styles and hot-towel shaves are still around. And the traditions that created them have kickstarted a bit of a riot.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 19, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Slickest and closest shave I’ve ever had!
reviews.reviewText: This cream is not to be lathered in a bowl. My cousin is a barber and he straight razor shaved clients daily. He knows what works and what doesn’t. This stuff is by far the slickest shaving cream I’ve ever used! I tried lathering this in my shaving bowl and it doesn’t lather at all. I consulted my cousin on this and he said you don’t need to lather it just massage into the face and beard and wet your face with hot water before. So I did. It only takes a quarter size amount and I got the closest and smoothest shave I’ve ever gotten! This stuff is top notch! The scent is old school barber shop scent that is truly an original scent. This product is imported from Holland and it say Holland’s finest. They aren’t kidding! It’s well worth the price and I highly recommend it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 17, 2022
reviews.reviewText: This product smells good and the shave is the closer that anything I’ve used to this point. Rinse razor frequently to avoid clogging of razor. Use it with mach3 and the results are amazing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Mild but manly, perfect compliment to the Reuzel aftershave and a damn fine shave.
reviews.reviewText: A little goes a long way, and the experience has you looking forward to shaving. I know that sounds crazy, but my barber suggested this stuff for its practical qualities and I found the scent to be a huge bonus. Mild but manly, it doesn’t run over your aftershave but somehow manages to compliment it. I use this with Reuzel aftershave and have zero blemishes, zero razor burn, and good skin winter or summer. I recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great product, terrible shipping.
reviews.reviewText: I baught this for my boyfriend, I dont shave (very thick beard) and its his favorite. It makes for a very smooth comfortable shave. And the smell is amazing.The shave cream comes in aluminum cans and when it arrived both were VERY dented and beat up. But it didn't affect the product inside at all so I didn't mind but the company should find a better way to ship!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is great stuff!!
reviews.reviewText: If you like a change from the daily can of Barbasol or Gillette shave cream, look no further. This little can holds a lot of shaves as the cream is fairly concentrated, and it doesn't take much to get a good coverage. It doesn't lather like from a can, but is more like a thick cream soap. The shave is awesome, and the ingredients contain a natural mild numbing agent in case you do get a nick or cut. Best of all, it leaves your skin smooth and smelling great! I was a bit skeptical at first when I ordered it, but my first shave changed all that! Great for a travel kit.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 15, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not sure about this one.
reviews.reviewText: Got a horrible shave but maybe I didn't use it right? Good luck to others who buy it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars All you need
reviews.reviewText: I have used other cream with a brush that lather up nice but I use this and apply with my fingers and I love the smell. I walked in a Barber shop and asked what he recommended and he gave me this one so I tried it and fell in love with the product. I immediately went on Amazon to see if they had it and they did so ordered two more. My wife was pretty amazed that I git so excited over shaving cream but I look forward to shaving now and the smell. Start the day right. She works with me and she enjoys the smell on the way to work as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Burns my skin
reviews.reviewText: This cream literally felt like it was burning my skin off...never had this kind of experience with any shaving cream, or shaving soap...hair products, great...this stuff, OMG!!

I have just had, by far, the best shave of my (very long) life.1) hot towel 30 sec.2) small dab of Reuzel massaged in well.3) Merkur 34 C with Astra bladeRazor glided through my stubble.Rinsed off and my face felt like I had just applied a superior moisturizer.No residue whatsoever. and skin felt like the proverbial baby's bottom.Note: Does not create a lather so brush is useless. No scent. Should last 6 months plus with daily shave. WOW !!!
This shave cream works very well in tandem with “Canadian Shave Cream”. It tackles what my barber refers to as my “Viking Beard” exceptionally well. My wife loves the scent as well.

reviews.reviewTitle: Tin only had half the product
reviews.reviewText: Was not what I expected and half the contents missing
